titleStmt.title: The Irish colours displayed in a reply of an English Protestant to a late letter of an Irish Roman Catholique : both address'd to His Grace the Duke of Ormond ...
titleStmt.author: Orrery, Roger Boyle, Earl of, 1621-1679.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Roger Boyle, Earl of Orrery. Cf. NUC pre-1956; Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
